lines.text:
[noticing that two pairs of reporters are standing on the marriage license line]
Look, I don't know what kind of license you fellas want, but this ain't the place for it!
Oh, I'll - I'll call the police.
Good! Tell them I'm not your husband. Don't let me go through life with that blot on my record.
Don't tell me beneath that rude exterior lurks the soul of a gentleman?
That's not all that lurks there.
Sir, let's have no trifling with the clerks, please.
